data.title: Cliff Robertson Biography
data.meta_description: Read all about Cliff Robertson with TV Guide's exclusive biography including their list of awards, celeb facts and more at TV Guide.
data.text:
Fast Facts

Was chosen to portray John F

Kennedy in the 1963 film PT 109 by Kennedy himself

Was on location in the Philippine jungle (filming Too Late the Hero) when he won the 1968 Oscar for Best Actor

For nearly four years after blowing the whistle on a Hollywood embezzlement scam in 1977, he was unable to get film or TV work

Was an avid pilot and collector of vintage aircraft

Awards

1969Golden Globe-Best Performance by an Actor in a Motion Picture - Drama: nominated

1968Oscar-Best Performance by an Actor in a Leading Role: winner

1968National Board of Review-Best Actor: winner

1961Emmy-Outstanding Single Performance by an Actor in a Leading Role: nominated
